Your PayPal balance has fallen below %1$s. Add money so you have enough to cover your future purchases.
Automatic top-up
Funding source
Automatic top-up

If there's not enough money in your PayPal balance at the time of your purchase, top-up instantly pulls increments of %1$s from your attached bank account or debit card so your purchase isn't declined. This works if you pay with:
 
• PayPal Cash Card
• Google Pay
• Samsung Pay
 
If you turn automatic top-up on or off for one of these services, you'll also turn it on or off for all the other services.

If there's not enough money in your PayPal balance at the time of your purchase, top-up instantly pulls increments of %1$s from your attached bank account or debit card so your purchase isn't declined. This works if you pay with:

%2$s
If you turn automatic top-up on or off for one of these services, you'll turn it on or off for all of them.
When you don\'t have enough in your PayPal balance, we\'ll add the amount of your choice from your bank account or debit card to cover the purchase.
Choose a bank account or debit card to top up your balance from
Add a Debit Card

If you don\'t have enough money in your PayPal balance when you use PayPal Cash Card, Google Pay and Samsung Pay, your purchase will be declined.
When you don\'t have enough money in your PayPal balance, if you use %1$s, your purchase will be declined.
When you don\'t have enough money in your PayPal balance, if you use %1$s, and %2$s, your purchase will be declined.
When you don\'t have enough money in your PayPal balance, if you use %1$s, %2$s, and %3$s, your purchase will be declined.
When you don\'t have enough money in your PayPal balance, if you use %1$s, %2$s, %3$s, and %4$s, your purchase will be declined.

PayPal.Me profile
Your PayPal.Me profile
Personal payments
Goods and services
People can always change to goods and services. It gives them PayPal Buyer Protection on their eligible items.
People can always change to personal payments if they\'re paying you back or chipping in for a gift.
It\'s free for your customers. You\'ll pay a fee when you receive it. You can both enjoy Buyer Protection on eligible purchases.
Your name and photo can still be seen by people you\'ve sent money to and received money from.
Friends, family or customers can follow the link, enter any amount and that\'s it. The money usually arrives in your PayPal account in moments.
Share Your Link

Your link now appears in your friends\' and customers\' PayPal address books so they can be sure they\'re sending money to the right person. \n\nYou can now add more information to your profile and always be in control of what people see.
Skip For Now
We\'re sorry, you can\'t use your PayPal.Me link to receive money at the moment. People can still pay you using Send Money from their PayPal account.
We\'re sorry, you can\'t use your PayPal.Me link to receive money at the moment. People can still pay you using Send Money from their PayPal account.
Your PayPal.Me link will be turned off and you won\'t be able to receive money with it. Your name and photo can still be seen by people you\'ve sent money to and received money from.
Your PayPal.Me can\'t be used to receive money.
Turn Off

I agree that my name, photo and PayPal.Me link can be shown to others to make it easier to find me on PayPal and to send or receive money, and I agree to the Terms and Conditions and Privacy Statement.
Let your friends pay you back quickly and easily. It\'s free for both of you when they use their bank account or debit card to send money in GBP to family and friends within the UK.
It\'s free for your customers. You\'ll pay a fee when you receive it. You can both enjoy Buyer Protection on eligible payments.
Don\'t show your location
Adding your location to your profile will help people know they\'ve found the right person.
The suggested locations are based on your PayPal primary address. You can edit your address if it\'s no longer up to date.
Say something about yourself or your business that you\'d like to share on your profile.
Share It
See Terms and Conditions.
Buyer Protection
Thanks for confirming your identity. Your %1$s transfer is all set. It should arrive in your bank account within 1 working day.
We couldn\'t confirm your identity. We\'re continuing to review your %1$s transfer and it should be released to your bank account within the next %2$s hours.
